sentence.Network_en: Why did you buy him a hairbrush? He's as bald as a coot!
sentence.Network_cn: 你干嘛给他买梳子? 他头上光禿禿的,一根头发也没有!

sentence.Network_en: He's as bald as a coot.
Our son came back from the barber's shop as bald as coot.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的儿子从理发店回来,头发剃得光光的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: probably of Dutch or Low German origin and related to Dutch koet

encyclopedia.content: coot英音：[ku:t]美音：[kut] 名词 n. 1.【 鸟】白骨顶2. 【口】锛埨巷級傻瓜 相关词组： as bald as a coot 头发脱光的 (as)bald as a coot completely bald 头顶全秃的。 相关例句： Jackson worked so hard in his life that he turned out bald as a coot before the age of 45. 杰克逊一生一直勤奋工作，45岁前他的头发就已经掉光了 He is only twenty-two years old, but due to a strange disease, he is as bald as a coo

entry.def: A coot is a water bird with black feathers and a white patch on its forehead.

means.word_mean: 1. slaty-black slow-flying birds somewhat resembling ducks
